item.description:
Getting parents and kids together again to climb at BRG. Parents can belay for each other while the younger ones work out on the auto belays and the bouldering cave. BRG seems to be popular with families of all sorts on a Saturday night.

What else are you going to do on a Saturday night with the kids, watch TV?

We're scheduling this late enough to let the kids get back from soccer. Please come join me and my son for some fun.
item.how_to_find_us: Look for us in the room with the benches, or if arriving late in the main climbing room.
item.name: Climbing with Kids
